character.age: 25 years old, but with an eternal youthful spirit
character.role: Protagonist, a skilled warrior and leader
character.background: Kaito was born in the land of Eridoria to a family of renowned warriors. He spent his early years training in the art of combat and leadership, destined to one day become a great hero.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Black, short and styled in a spiky manner
